title: Woman car handbrake:Woman Runs Herself Over After She Forgets To Apply Handbrakes Before Getting Out Of The Car
text:
Woman Gets Run-Over By Her Own Car After She Forgets To Apply Handbrake Before Getting Out Of It

Woman Gets Run-Over By Her Own Car After She Forgets To Apply Handbrake Before Getting Out Of It

It is not everyday that you see someone running-over themselves with their own vehicle (thank God for that).

However, a woman in the UK, did something that's both funny, and also could have easily gone wrong. She ran herself over, with her OWN car, after she forgot to apply handbrakes before exiting the vehicle. Before you think it’s sad, let me tell you she’s okay.

Now, for the funny part.

The woman stopped her car outside her house in Kentish town, because she wanted to check out some eggs that had been left on a stand outside the home. As the woman went to look at them closely, the car started moving towards her slowly and eventually hit her and the table of eggs.

Caters

Obviously, the woman was left with eggs all over her face. The car then stopped and moved backwards slightly and thankfully the woman didn’t sustain any major injuries. She immediately stood up, hoping that nobody saw the incident, but unfortunately, the whole thing was captured on CCTV camera.

You might want to remember to apply handbrakes, especially when you are standing in front of your car *LOL*.

Caters

Don't Miss 412 SHARES 150 SHARES 4.5 K SHARES

In another incident, Prashant Kasana, a resident of Chitehra village in Greater Noida, was not so lucky. He was returning from Jewar in a Jaguar, and his car was being driven at a very high speed as it approached the zero point on the expressway. The person driving it, according to Mahaveer, rolled down the window near the turn and tried to spit something he was chewing and lost the control of his car.

The car crashed into the grille on the side of the road near zero point, at the point where a vehicle has to follow a loop to switch to the Noida Expressway. He sustained serious injuries on his head.
description: It is not everyday you see someone harming themselves! A woman in the UK, had her car running over herself after she forgot to put the handbrake. Before you think it’s said, let me tell you she’s okay and now it’s damn funny! The woman stopped her car outside her house in Kentish town, because she wanted to check out some eggs that had been left on a stand outside the home.
